title: Tranquil Mussoorie Hilltop Escape with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Room Upgrade
description:
Perched on its very own hilltop in the 'Queen of Hill Stations', Tree of Life Highlands Mussoorie is the mountain escape you've been dreaming of. Situated far from the tourist crowds of Mussoorie, at the meeting point of Landour and Mussoorie, this tranquil paradise promises luxurious accommodations, heartwarming Tree of Life hospitality, and breathtaking views of the surrounding Himalayan mountains. The 16 gorgeous rooms and suites at this serene retreat promise personalised luxury and service, a rarity in this hill station. Access Tree of Life Highlands Mussoorie from Dehradun's Jolly Grant Airport (less than a two-hour drive) and Delhi (a scenic seven-hour drive) and also stay close to Mussoorie's top attractions, including The Mall Road, Kempty Falls, Doon Valley and more.

If you are a pet parent, you don't have to worry about leaving your furry babies behind for Tree of Life Highlands Mussoorie is a pet-friendly property, yet another rarity in the town. Indulge your taste buds with some amazing meals at the exquisite restaurant and enjoy ultimate comfort in the upgraded room included in your escape. Every evening at Sunset Terraces, you can have 'phaadi' mocktails while watching the sun set behind the gorgeous mountains. or those who value solitude, travel to the Library, while others can visit Far Horizon, a secluded terrace that looks out over Mussoorie and is especially beautiful at night.
offer_address: Mount Pleasant Oaks Road, Mussoorie Uttarakhand 248179 India

title: Mussoorie Wellness Escape with Daily Breakfast & Daily Yoga Classes
description:
Nestled amid the foothills of the majestic Himalayas, Yog Wellness by Amritara beckons you for a rejuvenating experience. Where luxury meets wellbeing, in the calming ambience of Uttarakhand's Mussoorie, the resort is an oasis for those looking for a holistic makeover. The Prana Spa, with its well curated therapies, takes you on a relaxing journey, letting you bid adieu to all your troubles and awaken revived and refreshed. The restaurant where the skillful chef prepares vegetarian fare surprises you with fresh, healthful food bursting with flavour and colour. The services on offer, from massage to yoga and meditation classes (charges may apply), allow you to tailor your wellness retreat to your specific needs.

Located just a 90-minute drive from Jolly Grant International Airport (DED)  in Dehradun, and a scenic drive from Delhi (less than six hours), Yog Wellness by Amritara promises a calming haven in the commotion of daily life - a mountain escape where wellness is the essence.
offer_address: Brook Villa Estate, Barlow Ganj, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 248122 India

title: Brand New Boutique Resort at the Foothills of the Himalayas
description: Imagine spectacular views of the green Doon Valley and the distant white-capped Himalayan peaks. Youâ€™ll find all that and more in the town of Mussoorie, a real sensory delight. Tucked away amidst this lush landscape, is the newly opened LaRiSa Resort, Mussoorie. A part of the LaRiSa collection of hotels, this luxury resort offers charming cottages and luxurious suites that reflect the essence of its lush surroundings. Take a relaxing break and head to the hills for a tranquil getaway, featuring daily buffet breakfast and a 25% discount on two dining experiences.
offer_address: Village kaplani Mussoorie- Dhanulti Road, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 249180, India

title: Five-Star Family Escape in Mussoorie with Daily Breakfast and Nightly Drinks
description: Embrace the natural beauty of the Himalayas while indulging in renowned five-star Marriott luxury at JW Marriott Mussoorie Walnut Grove Resort & Spa, situated on a lush hill surrounded by nature. Your winter escape includes daily buffet breakfast, one buffet or three-course dinner once during your stay, one nightly drink per person, 20% discount on food and drinks, 15% discount on spa treatments and complimentary Wi-Fi. Bring the kids along: two children aged 11 years and under stay for free, sleeping on existing bedding with meals as per package included.
location_description: JW Marriott Mussoorie Walnut Grove Resort & Spa
offer_address: Village - Siya, Kempty Fall Rd, Charleville, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 248179, India

title: Mussoorie Heritage Luxury with Doon Valley Views & Decadent Dining
description:
Old-world charm meets modern luxury at WelcomHeritage Kasmanda Palace Mussoorie, a stylish hotel housed in a 100-year-old heritage building. Standing proudly amid three acres of land, this Anglo-inspired paradise is located close to Mussoorie's Mall Road and was the summer retreat of the royal family of Kasmanda in 1915. Built way back in 1836, today this elegant hotel offers boutique luxury along with spectacular views of the Doon Valley. Ideal for those seeking either a secluded vacation or a relaxing family escape, WelcomHeritage Kasmanda Palace Mussoorie promises tranquility.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin your day with daily buffet/set-menu breakfast at Magnolia
- Enjoy one three-course/buffet dinner during your stay at Magnolia
- Relax with one nightly mocktail per person at Magnolia
- Make the most of your stay with a 20% discount on drinks and dining
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** Two kids (aged six years and under) stay free in existing bedding with all inclusions.
offer_address: Opp. Padmini Nivas, The Mall Road, Library, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 248179

title: Enjoy Spectacular Views of the Himalayas from the Highest Point in Mussoorie
description: Take in breathtaking 360-degree views of the Himalayas from the highest point in Mussoorie at Amatra Dunsvirk Court Mussoorie. Located just 2km from the famous Mall Road, with its picturesque viewpoints and shopping, this is the perfect spot for your mountainside escape. Includes daily buffet breakfast, daily buffet or three-course dinner, a nightly cocktail, glass of wine or beer each and 20% discount on food, non-alcoholic beverages and spa. Plus, two children aged 11 years and under stay free with daily breakfast and dinner.
offer_address: Vincent Hill, Baroda Estate Near Library Chowk, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 248179, India
